description: Job descriptionDUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES :   - Display strong Salesforce skills, and leverage those to complete everyday tasks and deliver on all the responsibilities   - Configure solutions, data and meta data to facilitate proof of concepts, enhancements, testing and support activities   - Configure users, profiles and access   - Troubleshoot issues with Salesforce and work closely with IT to fix the issues   - Enhance the customer experience using Salesforce Communities   - Driving and Implementing business process improvements in sales operations through CRM Solutions   - Communicate with business at all levels, run successful meetings and prepare detailed notes   - Review, analyze, and create detailed documentation of use cases, business processes along with user's needs including release notes, workflow, data, functions, design aspects and steps required to develop or modify processes or systems.   - Document process workflows and make appropriate recommendations to impact operational efficiencies   - Create detailed test plans, test data and test scripts for implementing new functionality, ensuring compatibility with existing processes.   - Work with diverse teams with multiple restrictions and time schedules while acting as an interface between the business teams and developers   Coordinate data governance   - Liaison with IT to identify areas of data inaccuracy and communicate with user community to correct data and update salesforce.com.   - Maintain on-going data clean-up   - Perform and improve standard operating procedures ensuring data quality   - Support organization in the understanding of data controls and consistency.   - Communicate specific trends, issues, targets and opportunities using analytics.   - Make recommendations to management for data quality   - Maintain accurate dashboards and reports. Continuously develop and maintain cascading dashboards for all user levels (executive, management, individual) and communicate specific trends, issues, targets and opportunities using analytics.   - Support users and user adoption   - Understand and navigate the application(s) accurately and support users troubleshoot issues   - Script, coordinate, manage and conduct training documentation and training sessions for new releases and on-going improvements.   - Initiate daily user collaboration and feedback.   - Provide one-on-one user coaching   - Manage daily campaign activities including development, distribution and tracking individual and group performance via salesforce.com dashboards   - Supporting business extensively by performing CRM related activities on a daily basis.   - Display strong Project Management Skills with ability to plan and execute small to medium size projects   - Provide daily and weekly status reports   - Estimate the resources and time required for projects   - Track, manage and report changes   - Understand and manage release cycles   - Work with diverse teams with multiple restrictions and time schedules  Required Candidate profileREQUIREMENTS FOR THE ROLE : - Bachelor degree or equivalent - 4+ years of Salesforce experience is must - Ability to Extract, Manage and Import data - User adoption experience is required - Data analysis and execution skills including the ability to convert data analysis into actionable information and disseminate to organization - Strong customer focus (both internal & external) and understanding of CRM principles and strategies - Collaboration skills including the ability to engage with IT, Sales, Customer Service and Marketing employees at all levels in order gather business needs and provide feedback. - Process improvement skills including the ability to analyze business activity and requirements to identify opportunities and lead process design, enhancement and automation efforts - Project & change management skills to provide input on continuous system enhancements and expansion - Strong experience with Microsoft office (Word, Excel, Power Point, Projects and Visio) or similar tools is desired. - Familiarity with complex Excel functions such as VLOOKUP and Pivot tables is preferred - Understanding of relational databases and object relationships - Software/Platform proficiency: Salesforce.com, Pentaho, JIRA, Dataloader, Jitterbit, MapAnything, Microsoft Office (Word, Excel), Wordpress, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, DreamweaverRoleBusiness Analyst,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaIT Software - description: Job description  Business Analyst - 7-9 yrs - Agile/Scrum     Basic Function   Business Analyst, with work ex or 2 - 4 years or more in the same position. Should be comfortable with Agile, Scrum and PMP methodologies. Display experience in Eliciting project requirements, stakeholder analysis, reporting etc. Basic understanding of Data Warehousing Terminologies and processes would be helpful. Excellent written and verbal communication skills should be able to Document and comfortable with MS Office Tools. .   Essential Functions :   - Create, Update Project Life Cycle Documentation (RACI, Charter, Scope, Stakeholder Analysis etc.)   - Business Analysis, process improvement and operational analysis.   - Data Warehousing and ETL Process understanding.   - Assist EM/PMs in review/analysis of existing projects.   - Business Acumen and understanding of different domains, Insurance, Healthcare, F&A etc.   - Able to communicate with peers and Leaders. Able to articulate clearly, summarize, present and document during meetings.   - Understand SDLC & PM concepts.   - Use different Analysis techniques and follow technical requirements, roles and processes.   - Knowledge of SQL, Python, .Net, Java would be an added advantage.   Primary Internal Interactions :   - Coordinate with Project Managers and participate in project meetings.   - Collaborate with other team members to review prototypes and develop iterative revisions.   Primary External Interactions :   - Limited to working with Project Managements and Engagement Managers.   Organizational Relationships :   Reports To : Project Manager - over time, this will evolve   Supervises : NA    Required Candidate profileSkills : Technical Skills - PMP, Agile/Scrum concepts. - Proficient with MS Office, Microsoft Project, Jira & other PM tools. - Familiar with SDLC and Data Warehousing Concepts. - Process Analysis techniques used in PMP, AGILE, Six Sigma desired. - Understanding of Analytics (Descriptive, Predictive, Prescriptive), or experience in AI, ML would be helpful. - Knowledge of SQL and Programming Languages like Python, Java, .Net would be helpful. - Knowledge of Tableau, Power BI, SAS and other reporting tools would be helpful. - Process Specific Skills - Ability to adapt to a variety of team work environments, as this changes client to client. - Able to deliver under pressure. Soft skills (Desired) - Experience working with multi-divisional business communities to leverage information across the enterprise to improve business effectiveness - Strong team building, interpersonal, analytical, problem identification and resolution skills Soft Skills (Minimum) - Exceptional analytical, conceptual, and problem-solving abilities - Strong written/oral communication and presentation/interpersonal skills - Highly self-motivated and able to work independently as well as in a team environment Work Experience Requirements - 2- 3 years as a Business Analyst, working with PMP or AGILE/SCRUM methodologies.RoleBusiness Analyst,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaIT Software - Application Programming, Maintenance,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategorySystem Design/Implementation/ERP/CRMEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Any Postgraduate in Any SpecializationDoctorate :Doctorate Not RequiredKey SkillsIT Business AnalystJavaPMPPower BISASAgile.NetScrumTableauIT Project ManagementPython

description: Job description  Greetings From Sellcraft Global Solutions         We are hiring for Business Analyst Subscription & Billing      Key    areas of responsibility -   Subscriptions    & Billing - Zuora - Business Analyst :        Job Summary:   Senior IT professional with at least 7 years of experience in    business analysis with an emphasis on Zuora - Subscriptions & Billing    domain. You will be part of Philips Global IT Delivery organization working    and deploying global IT solutions for Royal Philips.     Job    Description:        The Business Analyst translates business    requirement into IT solutions. Balancing out of the box solutions ( Subscriptions & Billing - Zuora  )  versus specific business requirements    minimizing customizations.       Understands business processes E2E, organization    and objectives and is able to translate these into IT solutions maximizing    benefit.      The Business Analyst is a counterpart of the    business representation for functional requirements and works together with Tech    Leads and third party (Vendor) who develop IT solutions.      Understands how the IT solution supports the    Business Process End2End. Has process and IT landscape expertise in    Healthcare.       Building competences that enable retention of    Philips specific knowledge and control the quality and compliance of the    solutions developed by third party (Vendor).      Responsible to maximize the use and acceptance of    standard/catalogue based solutions to support business needs driving industry    best practices processes.      Flexibly respond to shifting business needs and    priorities.      Prior to UAT validates that solution meets    business requirements.      Train key users and ensure availability of    training and support materials.   Position    Requirements:       Proven    knowledge of business process E2E.      Experience    with Agile ways of working in a multi-disciplinary and multi-cultural setting    is a requirement.      Minimum    5 years of experience in  Subscriptions    & Billing specifically on Zuora       Exercises    independent judgment in methods, techniques and evaluation criteria for    obtaining results. Creates formal networks involving coordination among    global work groups.      Acts    independently to determine methods and procedures on new or special    assignments. Will need to supervise the activities of others.      Has proven track record in formal testing    methods and preferably dealt with regulatory requirements and processes      Coaching / Leadership experience      Communicates requirements verbally and in    writing / depicted form at various levels and can prove this      Requirements gathering experience      Lean mindset (and formal training)     Experience    & Knowledge :        Core technology    expertise :           8 -    12 years of relevant IT experience      The    BA must have experience in Subscriptions & Billing - Zuora.      Must    understand integration between Zuora and with other applications.      Must    have strong analytical skills.      Strong    communication skills (verbal and written).      Agile    background preferred.       Good To Have :           PHILIPS prior experience.      Familiar    with (software) validation processes (SDLM, SVAL, NPSS, EU-MDR, GDPR)      Agile    scrum (preferably SAFe)      American    Productivity & Quality center (process framework)      . IF you are interested please share the profile for manjushree@sellcraft.net and references are highly appreciated. Responsible for development and maintenance of WiKi and KM artifacts. description: Job description   Business  Analyst - Job description       Role  description   This role  provides business analysis for  Global Banking Operations . It requires detailed  analysis, review and documentation of all or part of a business in terms of  business functions and processes in order to document the business requirements  which are to be delivered by the technology team. The BA will manage the  requirement development process for a transformation project through  elicitation, analysis, specification and verification of multiple levels of  requirements (business, stakeholder, solution). description: Job description  Position  Overview      The Global Business Operations Business Process Analyst is  responsible for the enhancement of best practice business processes,  implementation of new functionality, and supporting the business process  execution side of Salesforce Opportunity to Order, and other Business  Operations applications.  Develop relationships in a global matrixed organization to deliver required solutions to  enable business objectives. Works  closely with Global and Regional Business Operations teams to document As-Is  business processes and create To-Be business processes.  Develop business requirements used to design and implement system changes. Collaborate with IT Business Solutions to ensure  support for existing and future applications.      Key  Accountabilities   The Global Business Operations Business Process Analyst is accountable for the following across all regions:   Global Champion for       the adoption of Business Operations process and technology changes.   Develop requirements       using interviews, document analysis, requirements workshops, surveys, site       visits, business process descriptions, business analysis, task and       workflow analysis.  Initiate business       process modeling, identifying best practices, charting and analysis of       workflow, and creating and assessing performance measurements.   Conducts studies,       such as time studies or process studies, to review effectiveness of       current processes and makes suggestions to improve  Evaluates       performance against established metrics to determine acceptable levels of       quality or efficiency for various business functions and units.  Collaborate with Global and Regional process owners to ensure       process changes are communicated, understood and incorporated into current       processes.  Author functional process workflows, process narratives and       business requirements  Works closely with IT technical staff and/or outside resources to       determine technical solutions and/or applications to meet the identified       requirements.  Ensure implemented solutions function according to specifications       and are fit for purpose.  Coordinate the       planning and training activities related to the implementation of changes for       Global Business Operations applications.   Ensure properly maintained documentation of various features,       functions and associated processes.   Works with Learning & Development team to produce detailed       guides and training around processes and systems           Experience  Skills and Qualifications    The Global  Business Operations Business Process Analyst skills  and qualifications will include:   Knowledge of Global Business Operations'       core processes, including Opportunity Management, Quote Management, Bid       Management, Contract Management and Order Management  Previous working experience as a Business       Analyst for a min of 5 years  Experience in Apptus and contract       lifecycle management  Good salesforce experience required  Excellent communication skillsto       deliver concise, focused messages.   Strong facilitation skillsto clearly       articulate business issues and solution designs to the relevant players  Knowledgeable in methodologies of       gathering requirements and modelling business process flows  Comfortably using MS Office, Visio, and       similar tools.  Superb       cross-functional and leadership skills and the ability to influence across       all levels of the organization.  Ability       to prioritize and manage multiple, competing interests with tact and       diplomacy.  Well       organized, highly self-motivated and can perform without appreciable       oversight. This is a hands-on role which requires excellent business analysis and technical skills.

Responsibilities Collaborate with various business units to improve, reach and grow our business goals.

Analyze big data and translate it into effective and efficient action items.

Execute quantitative analysis, reports, statistical models and more with the end goal of supporting our client sales and marketing efforts. 

Create automated tools and dashboards to transform business needs into scalable and data driven solutions.

Lead data and analytical focal point in different projects across business, product and R&D teams.

Work as part of a team and closely with other departments within the company in a remote set-up.

Present your insights in a visual and coherent manner with short turnaround timelines.

Bachelor s degree in an engineering, science or equivalent (e.g. industrial engineering, information systems, computer science, statistics).

Fully proficient in SQL and MS Excel; statistical modelling, prediction and ML algorithms experience desirable.

Experience working with big data technologies and distributed computing tools Vertica / redShift, Athena, Hadoop, Spark, etc).

Experience in BI processes and visualization tools (MSTR, Tableau, Plotly, etc).

Programming experience in Python, R, etc.

High-level analytical and problem-solving skills with demonstrated business and creative thinking.

Proactive, independent and motivated, able to work with limited guidance.

Drive and manage E2E processes and work with multiple interfaces.

description: Job description  What we're looking for:   You are Customer Relationship Management Analyst serves Citrix by supporting Customer Relationship Management and Sales Force Automation systems and processes. In this capacity, it may be necessary to provide system support which may include software optimization, configuration, and maintenance. You are responsible for providing assistance to the sales organization to improve overall efficiency and increase system adoption.    The Service Cloud Analyst will be responsible for supporting and maintaining the Salesforce.com platform for the worldwide Services organization. This role is the main liaison between business end users, IT development teams, and Salesforce.com support. The Service Cloud Analyst will be the Salesforce.com and CRM subject matter expert who specializes in reviewing, analyzing, and evaluating business processes and user needs in order to formulate solutions that enable the overall business strategies. Will drive all phases of project life cycle including requirements gathering, application design, configuration, development, functional and user acceptance testing, and provide on - going production support post - implementation.    Responsibilities     Act as a first line of defense between Support team and dev engineers.    Root causes and reproduces complex customer issues.    Works on projects requiring technical decision making and input to schedules; receives no instruction on routine work and general instructions on new assignments; work periodically reviewed by Manager for the soundness of technical judgment and overall accuracy.    Coordinates testing efforts and coaches/mentors more junior team members.      Basic Qualifications      Associate's Degree in Information Systems or Business Administration, or equivalent combination of experience and education    1 - 2 years of Systems Management experience    High aptitude for systems management.    Intermediate level of expertise using Microsoft Office suite.    Must be comfortable supporting large user base and be able to maintain professional demeanor when dealing with distressed users.    Strong analytical mindset required.    Strong oral and written communications skills.    Ability to develop and maintain global virtual relationships.    Must be able to work in a cross - functional team environment.    Independent and flexible, with the ability to multitask under supervision         What you re looking for:    Our technology is built on the idea that everyone should be able to work from anywhere, at any time, and on any device. It s a simple philosophy that guides everything we do including how we work. If you re an engineer, we ll give you plenty of ways to test your skills on cutting edge technology. We want employees to do what they do best, every day.      Be bold. Take risks. Imagine a better way to work. If this sounds like you then we d love to talk.        Citrix is a cloud company that enables mobile workstyles. We create a continuum between work and life by allowing people to work whenever, wherever, and however they choose. Flexibility and collaboration is what we re all about. The Perks: We offer competitive compensation and a comprehensive benefits package. You ll enjoy our workstyle within an incredible culture. We ll give you all the tools you need to succeed so you can grow and develop with us.    Citrix Systems, Inc. is firmly committed to Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) and to compliance with all federal, state and local laws that prohibit employment discrimination on the basis of age, race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, ethnicity, national origin, citizenship, religion, genetic carrier status, disability, pregnancy, childbirth or related medical conditions, marital status, protected veteran status and other protected classifications.    Citrix uses applicant information consistent with the     If this is an evergreen requisition, by ing you are giving Citrix consent to be considered for future openings of other roles of similar qualifications. description: Job description  ARE   YOU   READY   TO   WORK   AT   ALTISOURCE?     Do you enjoy taking decisions that have a direct impact on the business and the people working around you?   Do you love high visibility with an opportunity to work with people across hierarchy?   Are you adventurous enough to expose yourself to multiple disciplines of Technology and ace through tough challenges?    If so, nice to meet you, we are Altisource! We are looking for an experienced, brilliant and self-starter   Senior Process Analyst   ,   reporting to our   Senior Manager, Business Operations  . If you are up for the challenge, keep reading!   As Senior Process Analyst, your role is key to the success of the Continuous Improvement Program. You will be responsible to lead, design and execute multiple improvement projects ensuring that they make significant and measurable impact on the business. Additionally, you will be regularly interacting with Senior Management and key stakeholders, keeping them engaged and updated about the program.     WHAT YOU'LL DO     Identify process improvement opportunities across the Technology Services Business Unit to improve operational efficiency and reduce cost   Analyze the root causes, benefits, costs, risks and prepare a business case for recommending improvement projects   Gather and analyze data as well as inputs from stakeholders to identify process gaps. Prepare as-is and to-be process maps.   Design improvement projects and work with subject matter experts to create an implementation plan   Manage end-to-end implementation of multiple projects and escalate deviations to ensure timely completion/de-prioritization of projects. Keep the stakeholders engaged and informed at all stages of the project   Facilitate workshops (Trainings, brainstorming, working sessions etc.) with a diverse set of stakeholders to achieve project goals          WHAT ABOUT YOU?     Proven process reengineering, process modelling and process improvement skills   Ability to work autonomously with minimal guidance   Exceptional communication skills   Ability to thrive in uncertain and ambiguous environment   Stakeholder management   Project planning and program management   Teamworks   Change management and   Leadership          WORKING AT ALTISOURCE ADVANTAGES      Prosperity      Competitive salary based on your experience and skills - we believe the top talent deserves the top rupee     Good Health      Comprehensive insurance plans like Medical, Personal Accident Benefit and Life Insurance   Wellness Programs (examples include eye examination, diabetes checkup camp, hemoglobin check and health talks)        RoleBusiness Analyst,Industry TypeReal Estate, Property,Functional AreaIT Software - Application Programming, Maintenance,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategorySystem Design/Implementation/ERP/CRMEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Post Graduation Not RequiredKey SkillsChange managementProcess improvementWellnessProcess re-engineeringProject planningContinuous improvementStakeholder managementOperationsBusiness caseBusiness operations

description: Job description    Open Position : Business Analyst         Mandate/Role      This position works closely with Product Management and Engineering team (Development, QA and Documentation team).     SA will participate in requirement gathering exercise, along with Product Management to document new feature requirements and modifications.     They will be experts in the respective domain / product line and does an impact analysis of the new feature on the existing product.     The candidate must possess a strong knowledge of data management applications.     Closely working with UI designers, SA should ensure user experience is not compromised.     They should have good communication and presentation skills.          Key Responsibilities     Become an expert in the respective product and should be able to resolve functional issues of engineering team .     Create Functional Requirement Design document for our customers. This will include, but is not limited to: POC, database design, data importing/manipulation, report writing..     Be a functional expert and advisor to the engineering team during development / QA and doc cycle.     Perform User Acceptance Test for programs and ensure proper functionality.     Review user manual and Test plan to ensure complete coverage of the functionality     Demo the new feature to Product Management and if necessary to customers     Other tasks as deemed necessary by his/her supervisor     Education and Skills: -      Education B.E. in Mechanical or Computer Science.     MBA in Marketing or e - commerce is an added advantage.     Experience 3 years of experience in a software environment in a Customer Support or Product Implementation or Business Analyst or Product Specialist role for an ERP.     Technical Knowledge and Skills     Experience in Microsoft .NET tools (specifically VB and C#), SQL and Oracle database knowledge, and Crystal Reporting knowledge desired.     Manufacturing knowledge or Customer interaction experience desired     Strong written and verbal communication skills     Good presentation skills and expertise in Window?s PPT     Familiarity with ERP and CRM systems. Strong problem solving skills is a must.     Other skills / expectations:     Required to obtain a working knowledge of the Aptean products     Required to obtain basic manufacturing process knowledge and apply it to the projects     . Required to stay current with new product features as well as new programming tools and languages as they apply to the Aptean product assigned.     Understand the intent of the Aptean product(s) tools/infrastructure, be able to utilize the tools/infrastructure, and able to assist other in the use of the tools/infrastructure.     Occasional travel may be necessary.             If you are determined to give your best every day and you are seeking an opportunity to work with an amazing group of people, then apply online today! company: Secureworks
description:
Job descriptionBusiness System Analyst,  Go To Market  MDM Bengaluru,  India Business Systems Analyst (BSA) acts as liaison between IT and business functions,  to help build solutions that facilitate VMware operate more effectively and efficiently. Solution focus areas include supporting Lead Management,  Opportunity Management,  Forecasting,  and Territory Planning. Knowledge of booking and sales compensation domain is a plus. Candidate will drive the identification,  implementation,  and modification of business systems to meet user needs and comply with company standards and guidelines.

 Responsibilities

 Architect  design solutions  processes using products and technologies like SFDC,  Oracle/ SAP,  MDM etc.

 Understanding broader business drivers to map business needs to process  functional solution design

 Work very closely with VMware Sales Operations teams to understand business requirements and then partner closely with IT development team for creation of functional and technical specifications document.

 Evaluate business and technical opportunities for joint development for building end to end technical solutions

 Manage relationships with multiple business teams for new solution features and technical support

 Key contributor in cross- functional teams,  BRD review,  development plans,  and roadmap development

 Develop future solution strategies by working closely with Business and IT Development teams

 Create and present functional and technical design including data analysis to business team,  and gather feedback to influence solution design and approach

 Internal client liaison,  managing project and enhancement requests as per priority

 Document functional business requirements,  process flow diagrams,  and business cases

 Facilitate requirements gathering and process mapping workshops

 Lead Collaboration Projects through the VMware IT Standard Development Lifecycle

 Identify opportunities to leverage VMware technology

 Facilitate review sessions with functional owners and end- user representatives

 Perform gap analysis: as is vs. to be

 Participate in end to end implementation planning including project management,  issue management,  communication and change management

 Independent self- motivated ability to learn on the job

 Preparation of user documentation and training documentation as necessary

 Leverage business knowledge and expertise to drive business process improvements 

 QUALIFICATIONS

 Minimum 4 years experience as Business Systems Analyst working with Sales functional areas.

 Thorough understanding of key end to end CRM processes  functions along with data insights.

 Extensive knowledge of industry best practices in CRM space both on process and technology

 Experience with upstream  downstream processes  solutions to CRM capabilities such as MDM (Customer,  contact,  company master),  pricing  discounting,  Order Management,  Sales Analytics is a big plus.

 Minimum 4 years experience preparing as- is  to- be process documentation,  and performing detailed gap analysis

 Experience leading distributed teams to design architecture and requirements for and oversee development of packaged and integrated solutions

 Demonstrated ability to have successfully completed multiple,  complex technical projects

 Demonstrated experience in project conceptualization and planning

 Ability to communicate in a clear and concise professional manner,  tailored to the appropriate audience; including both verbal and written communications.

 Ability to lead and work collaboratively within a business unit team  have strong influencing skills

 Ability to work on complex issues where analysis of situations or data requires an in- depth evaluation and may require collaboration across multiple technical teams

 Must be able to manage multiple priorities and complex tasks in a dynamic work environment

 Must have experience preparing end- user documentation and conducting end- user training

 Business Analysis experience in a high- tech (preferable software) company highly desirable.

 Project Management experience a plus

 Business process reengineering experience,  Six Sigma certification etc. is a plus. 

 EDUCATION:

 4- year degree (minimum) in Information Systems or related discipline

 Advanced degree would be a plusRoleBusiness Analyst,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaIT Software - Application Programming, Maintenance,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategorySystem Design/Implementation/ERP/CRMEducationUG :B.Tech/B.E. in ComputersPG :Post Graduation Not RequiredKey SkillsOrder managementVMwareData analysisChange managementBusiness analysisProject managementGap analysisOracleTechnical supportCRM

company: At Novo Nordisk, we are driving change to defeat diabetes and other serious chronic conditions. Diabetes poses one of today??s biggest global health challenges. We work for a future where fewer people get diabetes, everyone with diabetes is diagnosed, and everyone who is diagnosed receives adequate treatment and can live a life with as few limitations as possible. Since the company was founded in Denmark more than 90 years ago, we have been changing diabetes. This heritage has given us experience and capabilities that also enable us to help people defeat other serious chronic conditions: haemophilia, growth disorders and obesity. Our ambition is to take the lead in each of these areas, driving change with an unfailing belief that it can be done.
description: Job description             About the department        Cross IT India department is an integrated part of the Global IT India Organization in GBS,  responsible for managing support and maintenance processes for Analytics,  SAP BI,  Integration,  Big data,  Robotics solutions for all Regions in Novo Nordisk.             As a Business Analyst in Analytics Solutions team,  Global IT India team you will be responsible for the Manufacturing Intelligence dashboard and reports. You will work with development and maintenance of reports for POInT system. You will work closely with the Functional team and system managers to ensure superior customer satisfaction by delivering high end quality support to the front office in Headquarters. Strong communication skills effective verbal and written communication skills in English       Must be self managed,  responsive and dedicated to customer support        Quick learner and proactive in developing new skills and sparring with the team           Sense of urgency,  ability to manage and prioritize multiple work requirement to meet deadlines          Flexible and enthusiastic to go beyond the given instructions to create business value       Expert level skills on Tableau dashboard development. You will probably learn many things here,  but some of     the additional criteria we need you to already be quite experienced with.       Experience with developing complex Tableau reports      Experience with different data sources e.g. Plant,  enterprise systems      Experience with Alteryx DVW connector    Experience with SAP BW and queries     Experience with web framework (Angular,  React)     Experience with Pharmaceutical sales Manufacturing data    Experience in agile development process    Working at Novo Nordisk                             RoleBusiness Analyst,Industry TypePharma, Biotech, Clinical Research,Functional AreaIT Software - System Programming,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategorySystem Design/Implementation/ERP/CRMEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Post Graduation Not RequiredKey SkillsTelecomFront officedata securityCustomer supportAdobeInformation technologyAnalyticsSAP BIRoboticsSQL

company: Prione Business Services Private Limited commenced its operations in June 2014. It is a joint venture between Catamaran Ventures and Amazon.VISIONPrione's vision is to enable Indian small and medium businesses (SMBs) in the fast growing digital economy by creation and upliftment of SMB capabilities. We fulfil our vision by offering a variety of services tailored to help SMBs run their online businesses profitably.
description: Job description About the company: Cloudtail India Private Limited is a wholly owned subsidiary of Prione Business Services Private Limited. Prione Business Services Private Limited is a joint venture between Catamaran Management Services Private Limited and Amazon Asia Pacific Resources Private Limited. Cloudtail India Pvt. Ltd. is one of the sellers on the www.amazon.in platform and operates in various product groups such as Consumer Electronics,  Apparels,  Media,  and Home Kitchen etc.    Summary of Responsibilities Prione seeks a Financial Analyst who would be integral part of the Accounting and Controllership team. This position is expected to have a strong sense of ownership,  ability to identify process improvement opportunities,  drive positive change across the organization,  and enhance controllership process across the organization.  External Job Description  Retail category teams are responsible for shopper metrics of product availability,  product pricing and convenience via reduced delivery time. The BA will play a key role in contributing to the success of each focus area,  by partnering with respective business owners and leveraging data to identify areas of improvement optimization. He /  She will build deliverables like business processes,  pricing behavior analysis,  campaign analysis,  inventory placement analysis etc. that will contribute towards business decision making and can scale with growth. The role sits in the sweet spot between back-end operations and front-end shopper campaigns and provides an opportunity for growth,  high business impact and working with seasoned business leaders.  An ideal candidate will be someone with sound technical background in data analytics,  has solid business acumen and a strong solution oriented thought process. description:
Job descriptionJob DescriptionBusiness Analyst  -  IT Jobs

 2  -  3 Years 

Based on Experience 

 BangaloreOur client is looking for professionals with project and delivery management skills to join our team. We offer excellent ,  above - market salary + bonus + benefits ,  and remuneration will not be a constraint for the right individual. 

Position : 

Permanent

Location : 

Bangalore

Salary :

Based on Experience 

Job Details:

Job Title: Business Analyst

Experience: Minimum of 2 - 3 years of Product implementation / QA / support experience

Salary: Based on experience and knowledge + bonus + benefits ,  and remuneration.

Working Hours: Shift 2: 2 PM IST to 11 PM IST (overlap with general shift and US shift)

Job Responsibilities:

This role will have 3 facets:

 -  Analyzing Customer Support issues

 -  Assisting with Customer Implementations

 -  Assisting with Product Quality Assurance

Essentially ,  the person will become a go - to - person for the Product. Over time ,  expected to develop a strong knowledge of the inner workings of the product (business logic ,  not software code) and functionality

Provide Level 2 support  -  Support helpdesk team in problem triaging and fixing any issue pertaining to training or configuration

Interact with Client teams (business and IT) to understand the exact problem during implementations or post - Go - Live

Analyze the problem to isolate the problem area and list possible solutions if possible

Should have good SQL skills (SQL Server preferred) to write queries to understand the data presented through the flow

If an issue found that is beyond the ability of the analyst to fix ,  he / she should work with the engineering and product team to strengthen / fix the product

Should have the ability to write requirements in detail for the benefit of engineering teams (QA and DevSkills required:

Must have Good SQL knowledge: Should be able to track the data to identify the exact location of the problem.

Must have Demonstrated experience as a product support analyst or product implementation analyst or product quality assurance analyst.

Communication Skills: should have experience talking to clients and engaging them

Problem - Solving Skills: Should be able to isolate the problem area

Critical Thinking Skills: Should be able to provide valuable feedback towards product improvement

Documentation and Specification Skills: Incident management and problem management along with detailed documents

Analysis Skills: Should be an analyst at heart ,  motivated to get to the heart of problems and create simple solutions

Facilitation and Elicitation Skills: Should be able to facilitate the smooth working of engineering teams during problem fixing and QAWill Reports to:

Customer Support Manager (if we have a customer support manager ,  then yes. Otherwise ,  this role could report into the Product Manager  / Sr. Product Manager for the product)Educational Qualification:

An Engineer by qualification (preferably with an oil and gas / mechanical background)

description:
Job descriptionBusiness Analyst plays a key role on the product management team to translate business requirements into detailed functional specifications , to help communicate these specifications to Development and to maintain changes to these specifications in an agile development environment. In addition the Business Analyst will play a key role in working with the quality assurance team to help develop test plans , certify adherence to functional specifications and deliver a market- ready product.

Qualifications/ Requirements: 

Bachelor s Degree in Engineering with 4 6 years of experience working in software (enterprise application) development 

Experience automating complex business processes 

Global Trade Management or Supply Chain Management domain preferred 

Strong communication skills and inclusive style. (will ask for samples of written communications and authored specifications) 

Ability to interact with and influence stakeholders across an organization 

Demonstrated ability to take initiative , prioritize and manage time , and meet aggressive deadlines 

Knowledge of software development lifecycle (SDLC) , Agile Methodology , JIRA /  Confluence 

Knowledge of technology structures: Database , XML Technology , Data exchange protocol , Communications 

Data extraction , transformation and loading , output (report) design and data queries (SQL) Responsibilities: 

Collaborates with Product Managers , trade content subject matter experts , and Development to identify and document future requirements and translate them into functional specifications. 

Refines requirements with industry standard analysis techniques such as data flow modeling , workflow diagrams , and functional decomposition analysis. The Analyst will confirm requirements through interviews , workshops , and/ or existing systems documentation or procedures. 

Works closely with Development and Quality Assurance to support testing against application requirements. Researches and resolves defects with business and technical teams. Assists the QA team to define and create test data as needed. 

Compares business requirements to delivered system to ensure all requirements are met and function as designed. 

Gains expertise in the domain of global trade management domain and the technology platforms of the company. 

Overall accountability for Requirements identification , definition and fulfilment 

Setup data , validate & certify the application features  , capture necessary documentation and ability to train

company: At Novo Nordisk, we are driving change to defeat diabetes and other serious chronic conditions. Diabetes poses one of today???s biggest global health challenges. description: Job description                             As a Business Analyst we expect you to prepare monthly corporate cost management reports,  quarterly management reports,  prepare presentations e.g. for quarterly reports and prepare benchmark analysis,  competitor analysis based on financial statements and balance sheet we also expect you to prepare annual benchmark report and Net Operating Asset (NOA) report country wise.           In addition to the above tasks,  we expect you to prepare swiss reporting for staff finance comprising of cost allocation and non- refundable VAT controlling on quarterly basis and bonus accruals on monthly basis. Besides,  you must consolidate and update the comparison data and must contribute to continuous improvement of processes. We also expect you to ensure documentation is recorded and maintained according to corporate finance archiving guidelines.           Additionally,  we also expect you to ensure all the process are delivered with high quality and all the guidelines and supporting documentations are up to date. description:
Job description

Ability to analyze Big data and do Machine learning are 2 of the hottest skills to have right now. Here is a job which requires both of them.

Designation Business Analyst-  Machine Learning

Location Bangalore

BRIDGEi2i is an analytics solutions company partnering with businesses globally,  helping them achieve accelerated outcome harnessing the power of data. BRIDGEi2i helps companies to BRIDGE the gap between INFORMATION,  INSIGHT and IMPACT in their journey to institutionalize data driven decisions across the enterprise.

We are head- quartered in Bangalore,  India s Silicon Valley,  leveraging the ecosystem of analytics talent,  technology development and innovation based on academic research. The leadership team of BRIDGEi2i are among the leaders in the analytics industry and each of them have a decade plus experience in the field. They bring significant expertise in building,  managing and delivering analytic value for customers having established large analytics shared services and third party consulting capabilities,  with both General Electric (GE) /  GENPACT (pioneers in the Indian KPO industry) and Hewlett Packard (HP) Company (largest analytics shared services for a technology company).

The team at BRIDGEi2i has intimate knowledge of the analytics market and vast knowledge of analytics applications across industries as diverse as financial services,  technology,  healthcare,  retail,  consumer packaged goods,  insurance,  manufacturing and telecom.

We are looking for talented individuals,  interested to be a part of the BRIDGEi2i journey to build a best- in- class organization,  driving increased adoption of business analytics across the globe.

Responsibilities:

Work on big data challenges using machine learning techniques

Understand business requirements to translate business problems into analytics problems and construct analysis road- map based on the business context

Manage large volumes of structured and unstructured data,  extract  clean data to make it amenable for analysis

Build  fine tune self- learning algorithms,  to support real time insight generation. Ability to define success metrics and choose algorithms that work best in specific scenarios. Fine tune execution mechanism to improve speed  reliability of results.

Help deploy analytics,  machine learning solutions for on- going insight and decision support. Enable tracking of outcomes,  to measure effectiveness of algorithm.

Keep up with latest developments in Big Data analytics tools,  machine learning algorithms,  environments that enable real time processing of such algorithms etc.Qualification and Skills: 

Essential:

Has applied knowledge of machine learning techniques to large data environments

Familiar with widely used algorithms like Random Forest,  support vector and gradient boosting,  collaborative filtering techniques

Advanced degree in a quantitative discipline with strong foundation in computer science  /  or statistical methods  /  or optimization techniques with good conceptual understanding of their applications

Very good interpersonal skills,  able to influence without authority,  adaptable to changes and possess initiative and creative approaches

Strong analytical,  presentation and communication skills

Self- starters,  willing to work in a start up with the motivation to build the organization as the best in the industryPreferable:

Proficiency in programming languages,  C,  C++,  Java with experience in building numerical processing,  optimization,  self- learning algorithms etc.

Experience  /  or course work in unstructured data management,  data structures,  data mining algorithms,  graph theory,  computational science etc.

description: Job description We are looking for a Young, Keen and Dynamic candidate with strong team handling skills. The candidate should have good communication customer service skills combined with excellent presentation skills and follow up skills. The applicant should have the ability to handle work pressure and should have selling and management skills.        Experience          2 years (Proven work experience as a Business Analyst).           Responsibilities         Is a self-starter. Can develop business requirement for the product independently with little inputs from problem statements.     Understands market needs and map those requirements to product, services and create use cases/ user stories.     Ability to talk to multiple customers to understand the different possibility of the workflows, challenges and needs; uses these information to come up with a generic solution for the product.     Ensures project/product requirements documents are complete, current, and stored appropriately.     Has ability to separately define end user requirements, implementation, support requirements, and integration requirements.     Gets hands-on to validate the solution once it is developed to ensure it is as per the expectations.     Provide demos to customers and get the inputs on the final solution. Incorporate any major comments/concerns on the solution.     Finalize functional requirements, assign for development team and also provide guidance for work completion.     Contributes towards expanding and improving existing product set by identifying new features or service opportunities.     Defines the non-functional requirements that are required for the solution considering the market needs.     Participates in identifying the risks involved in the solution and works with Project Manager to closely monitor the business risks and helps to mitigate them.     Ensures process improvement and compliance in the assigned module and participates in technical discussions/review.     Coordinates with developers / other architects, Product / Business SMEs, and Stakeholders.     Participates in strategic cross-functional sessions.     Reviews and provide inputs to functional test cases, scenarios.     Good understanding of the pros/cons of the technical solution, ability to understand technology better.           Requirements         Bachelor's (Preferred).     An analytical mind.     Hands on experience in each of the areas mentioned under responsibilities.     Good understanding of the pros/cons of the technical solution.     Relational Database Concepts and Understanding.     Proficiency with BA tools.     Desire to Learn and Grow.     Team work and Collaboration.     Good verbal and written communication.     Good presentation Skills.     Ability to face, influence/negotiate with Customers.     Strong analytical, problem-solving, negotiation and organizational skills. description: Job description      Join us as a Business Analyst    Take on a critical role defining and realising fantastic solutions, processes, benefits and new opportunities to deliver to our stakeholders  You'll be working in a vibrant, forward looking team and helping us to shape the future of our business  It's a great chance to hit the ground running, take advantage of our development opportunities, and advance your career     What you'll do   In your new role, you'll be supporting the analysis of complex cross franchise and pan group requirements, while capturing, validating and documenting business and system requirements and making sure that they are in line with key strategic principles. In the course of your work, we'll also look to you to build, manage and maintain a positive working relationship with stakeholders and third party suppliers across multiple franchises and functions. company: Brookfield Global Relocation Services
description:
Job descriptionBGRS develops and implements comprehensive talent mobility solutions for corporate and government clients worldwide. With deep industry experience and unparalleled insights on the future of talent mobility,  we enable our clients to craft mobility programs that will empower them to attract,  retain and develop top performers. 

Role Overview 

We are looking for a Business Analyst with strong experience working with SalesForce.com. The Business Analyst has four core roles:

Salesforce.com stewardship and application ownership

Marketing integration,  campaign support and metrics

Sales report generation,  data interpretation and analysis. Trend identification to support client development leadership in making better,  more informed decisions

Proposals database (Qvidien) management and reporting in support of the proposal development team 

What You'll Be Doing 

 Provide system administration support of internal and customer- facing Salesforce environment,  especially related to customized applications,  user permissions,  security settings,  custom objects and workflow 

 Keep abreast of new Salesforce.com features and functionality and provide recommendations for process improvement 

 Enhance forecasting and reporting capabilities,  including the construction of new reports and dashboards. Review and improve upon the current system for the overall tracking and organization of reports and dashboards 

 Develop customized solutions within the Salesforce platform to support BGRS business functions and meet agreed objectives,  requirements and company goals 

 Manage daily support and maintenance of internal Salesforce instance,  and conduct long- term improvement operations to ensure compatibility with evolving company requirements 

 Collaborate with various internal departments,  including marketing,  product development and operations,  to ensure Salesforce environment supports internal needs relating to functionality and performance What You Bring to BGRS 

 BS in Mathematics,  Economics,  Computer Science,  Information Management or Statistics 

 Minimum work experience: four years of Salesforce application development 

 Self- motivated and creative 

 Technical expertise regarding data models,  database design development,  data mining and segmentation techniques 

 Strong knowledge of and experience with reporting packages 

 Knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing large datasets (Excel,  SAS,  etc) 

 Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect,  analyze,  and communicate with attention to detail and accuracy 

 Excellent project management skills and an ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously 

 Fluent English language skills in both oral and written communication are essential What BGRS Offers 

Competitive salary and incentive plans 

Workplace flexibility for a balanced work/ life approach 

Comprehensive benefits packages and wellness program 

Generous company- paid vacation days and holiday time 

Challenging,  collaborative,  diverse corporate culture 

Ongoing opportunities for learning and career development 

Salesforce Developer Certification 

Experience developing customer- facing user interfaces 

 As an Equal Opportunity Employer,  BGRS embraces diversity and,  as such; is dedicated to considering all qualified applicants without regard to race,  color,  gender,  religion,  national origin,  disability,  age,  sexual orientation,  marital status,  pregnancy and parenting status,  protected veteran status and any other characteristic protected by law. Employment may be subject to additional background checks. 

Alternatively,  you can apply to this job using your profile on one of the following sites:

description: Job description Gather business requirements,  convert the same to Business Requirement Documents (BRD) and Functional Requirement Documents (FRD) in the form of user stories. Create use case models,  business process flowcharts and screen mockups. Stakeholder Analysis: Communicating requirements to stakeholders. Agile: Conduct sprint planning meetings,  scrum,  sprint demos and retrospective meetings with onshore and offshore teams. Discuss functional requirements with the technical architect team to study the implementation feasibility of the requirements. Conducting requirements workshop with the development and testing teams. Identified gaps and external dependencies in the requirements. Manage the baseline requirements in co-ordination with the development team and Clients. Maintain requirement traceability matrix and tracking requirements development status. Identifying skills required for effective solution implementation. description: Job descriptionJob Description:  Business Analyst owns the client engagement and is responsible for owning the deliverable. They form the heart of the DenuoSource team to bring the best of what DenuoSource has to offer to each client situation. Business Analyst will be the thought and people leader in the area of research and analytics. Specifically,  Business Analyst will provide leadership on and develop research studies  (surveys)  and statistical models. Responsibilities:  As Business Analyst for DenuoSource you will have a broad set of duties to carryout on a day- to- day basis. At DenuoSource,  you are expected work with a highly motivated team in a fast paced environment. These duties include but are not limited to:  Initiate,  carry out and write up extensive high caliber economic and technical research and analysis of all clientele work assigned to you on a day- to- day basis. Extend business analytical support to all client engagements of the DenuoSource which would include work planning,  scope refinement,  quality assurance;   Provide expert- level advice on relevant technical aspects of survey development,  econometrics,  regressions and other statistically- driven business methodologies;   Active participation in and contribution to team discussion on problem solving,  and effective approaches to deal with engagement- specific issues etc. Besides providing business oriented solutions,  not just statistically based outcomes;   Execute expert level SPSS /  SAS based modeling to DenuoSource clientele. Qualifications:  The ideal candidate should have a minimum of a Masters in Management/  Advanced Statistics from reputed institutes. Desired Skills:  2- 4 years of experience in business analysis with a KPO/ Market Research firms/  or content related consulting firm;   Sales & Marketing research/ analytics for the retail and/ or consumer goods ors;   Combination of technical know- how and practical business acumen. company: Leading Client
description: Job description   Job Description :   This potential candidate will perform Business Analysis work as a member of the Order Management Global Process team on company's SAP implementations, as well as act as a BA on non-SAP related projects. The potential candidate will interact with business users and Global & regional IT counterparts   A Day in the Life :   - Serve as a business analyst on small to large-sized technical projects. Provide input to plans, project deliverables and completion dates.   - Document clear and complete business requirements, match these requirements to objectives and guide business partners to the appropriate solutions, including standard functionality or through enhancements that will achieve business goals.   - Provide functional knowledge of current systems and data.   - Work to develop solutions to problems. Ensure solutions are consistent with organization objectives.  - Learn to facilitate small projects through the systems development life cycle, including project definition, requirements gathering, design, development, test, release and post-implementation support.   - Drive standardization across businesses of processes and master data.   - Participate in cross-functional process improvement project teams and provide technical and business process knowledge.   - Demonstrate strong results orientation (driving to deadlines, etc.)   - Document standard work and processes for implementation of Source systems.   - Analyze current Order Management business processes and apply best practices/knowledge of systems to develop improved, standardized processes for company businesses.   - Take direction to successfully implement processes within the Order Management core process space. Show willingness to learn and develop through partnerships with team leadership.   - Ensure proper validation documentation is created for all projects (i.e. company System Compliance Methodology (MSCM)).   - Ensure that company's systems and the information on them are protected in accordance with company's Information Protection Policies and Standards, as well as best Information Protection practices.   - Ensure personal understanding of all quality policy/system items that are personally applicable. Follow all work/quality procedures to ensure quality system compliance and high-quality work.   - Provide mentoring and coaching to team members, to help ensure they demonstrate required SAP application and business process skills   - Ensures adherence to Corporate IT policies, guidelines, and procedures.   - Deploy and leverage applicable tools to facilitate adequate system monitoring & troubleshooting   - Focus upon continuous improvement to increase efficiency and maximize value to clients   Relationship Management :   - Effectively communicate with various levels of the organizations: business partners on projects, developers, and IT peers.   - Provide operational assistance to business stakeholders for issues impacting their ability to effectively meet business objectives.   - Maintain a productive relationship with stakeholders and peers through effective communication and collaboration   Key Responsibilities :   - Document clear and complete business requirements, match these requirements to objectives and guide business partners to the appropriate solutions, including standard functionality or through enhancements that will achieve business goals.   - Provide functional knowledge of current systems and data.   - Learn to facilitate small projects through the systems development life cycle, including project definition, requirements gathering, design, development, test, release and post-implementation support.    Required Candidate profileMust Haves : - Minimum 4 years of experience serving as functional SME within SAP Sales & Distribution process - Experience with SAP ECC and Sales Management (SD Module) configuration, implementations, and integrations. - Extended experience with SAP Sales Order Management (including Pricing and Billing processes and functionality). - Billing document configuration and copy controls - Subscription billing and billing plans o Billing batch jobs - Payment Cards - Rebate Processing - Inter-company Billing - Pricing configuration using the condition technique - Condition types, access sequences, pricing procedures - Pricing condition copy control - Pricing condition requirements (no ABAP needed) - Pricing condition exclusion - Price lists and customer hierarchy pricing - Price reports - Free goods - Experience with SAP ECC platform, strategies, best practices - Experience in driving initiatives within an organization, based on input from cross-functional teams. - Experience in business process definition, requirements definition, technology solution research, and design specification - Experience creating system concept/feasibility and cost-benefit documentation. - Experience and understanding of enterprise architecture and end to end capabilities from a sales order management perspective. - Ability to participate and deliver across all facets of the System Development Life Cycle (SDLC). - Ability to efficiently multi-task and be self-motivated while working with others. - Outstanding analytical skills, strong experience interpreting test results & drawing conclusions - Ability to work independently and collaboratively. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. - Resource, cost, and budget planning and estimation. - Demonstrated follow-through, initiative, attention to details and drive for continuous improvement. - Ability to work effectively under pressure in a fast-paced environment. - Experience in facilitating face-to-face group meetings and discussions. Preferred : - Business analysis and requirements definition skills - Experience with SAP LE (Outbound) and SAP Transportation Management - Working knowledge of understanding and analyzing SAP ABAP programming - Experience with SAP Integration using IDOCs, RFC and Web services. - Experience having completed at least 1 full lifecycle project implementation & support Project. - Strong analytical, problem solving, and decision-making skills - Learning agility, creativity, and intuition reacting to challenging situations - Solid oral and written communication skills - Foster positive working environment. Ability to mentor less experienced team members - Ability to work collaboratively and partner with peers, clients, and vendors - Ability to manage multiple priorities simultaneously Work Timings : This role may require working in shifts and shift shall be assigned as per business need. City : Bangalore Experience : 3-9 Years RoleBusiness Analyst,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaIT Software - ERP, CRM,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategorySystem Design/Implementation/ERP/CRMEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Any Postgraduate in Any SpecializationDoctorate :Doctorate Not RequiredKey SkillsSAP ECCIT Business AnalystSAP ABAP programmingSAP ServicesSales ManagementIT Business Systems AnalystSAP Transportation ManagementIT Project Management

Job Description: The candidate will be member of the Home Lending Production CFO support team. This team serves as a planning and analytical resource to help executives manage, forecast, plan and gain insight into the P&L requirements of the business.  This team's responsibilities include managing the monthly and quarterly Portfolio and revenue forecasting process, coordinating with Corporate finance teams, managing the annual budget/mid-year forecast process, managing several financial and strategic analytic projects and providing insight and decision support to the CCB and JPMC leadership. Ideal candidate will help in all aspects of Management Reporting related to the Home Lending organization. The candidate will be focused on Forecasting market level metrics in support of both CRA & Fair Lending, with focus on at risk markets, Pricing optimization analysis across all production channels, Analysis & assessment of key affordable strategies, Reporting of key results, highlighting performance accomplishments & areas of opportunity.Roles and Responsibilities include:Prepare different Pricing decks to help the business to take call on the Pricing StrategySupport all the adhoc researches requiredPrepare Weekly/Monthly/Quarterly reportsSupport on the automation initiatives across the teamSpecial projects and ad-hoc analysis as neededPrepares management presentationsQualifications /Skills / Competencies Needed/Education Qualifications -   MBA      (Finance)  (or similar educational background) with 1-3 years of      post-qualification experienceExperience      in banking industry preferredSkill set      needed is a person that has superior data analytical skills Ability to      work with large quantities of data Good      technical skills in Microsoft productsExcellent      communication and partnering skillsAbility to      multi-task and work autonomously within team environmentAbility to      research issues/problems and provide a 'solution-based' approach Adaptable to      change and ambiguity in the work environmentExpert      knowledge of Excel (i.e. use of pivot tables, macros, arrays, etc), MS      AccessStrong      knowledge of EssbaseShift      Timings - 2pm -11pm IST . Morgan Chase & Co. serves millions of consumers in the United States and many of the worlds most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under its J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Information about J.P. Morgan Chase & Co. is available at www.jpmorganchase.com.About J.P. Morgan Corporate & Investment BankJ.P. Morgan's Corporate & Investment Bank (CIB) is a global leader across banking, markets and investor services. Morgan in India provides a comprehensive range of Corporate & Investment Banking, Commercial Banking, Asset & Wealth Management, and Corporate functions services and solutions to our clients, executing some of the most important financial transactions and providing essential strategic advice to our clients such as the government, large domestic and multi-national corporations, non-government organizations and financial institutions and investors. India is a key market for JPMorgan Chase globally and our employees in India are a critical part of how we do business globally and are integrated within our businesses. Our Global Service Centers (GSCs) are strategically positioned in Mumbai, Bangalore and Hyderabad to support the firms operations regionally and globally. The centers provide comprehensive strategic support across technology and business operations processing to all lines of business and the corporate functions.The Consumer Banking Specialist is responsible for providing timely resolutions to our Consumer and Community Banking customers queries.  They will connect with our customers through inbound/outbound calls regarding transactions on their accounts such as payments, loans, charges/fees, interest rates, rewards and other issues.  Chase relies on digital marketing as a key strategic channel in driving acquisition, branding, and cross-sell opportunities to millions of customers and potential customers across a suite of financial services products. This digital execution role will manage all aspects of the Owned Media channel from ad placement on chase.com, to managing the decision engine and targeting that drives these ads. This role leverages multiple marketing technologies one being primarily being PEGA Marketing.      In addition, this position requires experience with campaign and timeline management, collaboration with agencies/vendors, measuring and reporting key metrics for digital campaigns, and process adherence through the established workflow.        The Digital Execution role will be responsible for various activities, including the following:Youllbe part of a cross-functional team thats responsible for the full softwaredevelopment life cycle, from conception to deployment. Primaryliaison between Marketing Channel Services  Owned Media team and line ofbusiness that leverage chase.com ad serving. Createand edit page configuration through marketing platforms like PEGA MarketingCloud. description: Job descriptionCloudtail India Private Limited is a wholly owned subsidiary of Prione Business Services Private Limited (Prione). Prione is a joint venture between Catamaran and Amazon. Summary of Responsibilities Cloudtail seeks a Finance Analyst to be a key business partner with the Retail teams. Cloudtail is continuing to expand its successful retail business and we are looking for a highly motivated leader who will partner the vendor management team and will be responsible for key business KPIs on In-Stock; working capital investment; Inventory Reserve for the business category. The successful candidate will be a self-starter who is comfortable with ambiguity, detail oriented and will possess the ability to work well with cross-functional teams including corporate finance; vendor management and category management teams; AR, Accounting, and software development teams. Primary responsibilities: Deep dive on impact of selection plans of the vendor management team and planned purchases. Review impact on working capital and guide business on corrective steps to keep working capital healthy Monitor in-stock of selection on the platform, as well as slow inventory to avoid inventory reserves. Continuous benchmarking of existing vendor terms and drive towards improved terms year on year. Identify key vendor funding opportunities to improve credit terms and in effect working capital investment. Drive the P L of the business by highlighting CCOGS opportunities and creating accountability in the system. Basic Qualifications: 3+ years of experience in business finance. Chartered Accountant / MBA Finance. Strong analytical skills Experience working with cross-functional teams Fluency in Excel and SQL Solid communication skills written and verbal Preferred Qualifications: Understanding of the retail business Maintain a high level of attention to detail, the ability to work independently, adjust priorities, and work in a continuously changing environment. VMware s award- winning technology,  market- leading position and culture of excellence provide the more than 20000+ passionate people we employ in 120+ locations worldwide with a platform for professional growth and the excitement of being an early- stage innovator.

 VMware Business IT (Subscription  Perpetual) and New Technologies Group

 Our organization supports VMware SaaS and Perpetual (Order to Cash),  Licensing functions with ERP platforms and systems capabilities. We are transforming our software delivery practices to bring in greater agility,  scale and resiliency. We are building the next generation SaaS Order to Cash platform that can deliver new digital experiences for employees,  customers and partners. We are also enhancing our licensing Order to Cash platform to improve the customer experience and make it more scalable. We value innovation and empower our employees to do their best work and grow their careers at VMware.

 About You

 You demonstrate strong functional expertise in your domain can easily switch between different tools being used in the same domain

 You love working with some of the best engineers,  product managers and architects around the world

 You strive to excel and to innovate Responsibilities:

 Own and conduct system design sessions and align to operations processes

 Own  drive functionality /  design of VMW s next- gen Product Hub as a central platform to meet future needs,  scalability,  keeping industry- leading best- practices in mind

 Extensive hands on previous Oracle PDH configuration experience and define Product/ Offers for SaaS and On- Prem products.

 Experience in designing integrations with external systems

 Ability to define conversions,  std conversions per module,  Security Roles  Duties to be configured.

 Good understanding of how Subscription Order Management with Usages,  Billing,  and Invoicing

 Work with geographically distributed team comprised of RD,  IT and Operations

 Analyze business use cases that are eligible for automation

 Author System Design documents and translate /  Articulate functional requirements clearly to Developers/ QA team- members

 Prepare specifications for application (Functional Specification Design)

 Perform complex data analysis and data profiling to support projects and research

 Partner with Development Teams (ETL,  MDM) to deliver efficient and sustainable solutions Qualifications:

 Certifications in Oracle PDH

 Minimum 8 years of experience in crafting /  developing /  maintaining highly scalable and resilient system in the SaaS and On- Prem business models

 Strong hands on experience in Oracle Product Data Hub (PDH)

 Experience in delivering products using agile methodology

 Experience in crafting creative solutions to difficult problems

 Strong Interpersonal skills: Strong presentation/  communication /  facilitation/  leadership skills (oral and written). Comfortable working with senior executives.

 Flexibility to work both in production support and change requests /  implementations as needed

 Strong social skills and experience in engaging business leaders,  IT senior leadership and Engineers

 Flexible and should be a quick learner to move to other technologies as needed Nice to Have Experience

 Experience in SAP MDG is a huge plus

 Experience in API based architecture involving SAP MDG is a huge plus
